Notes: Browser + server Supabase clients; must match Supabase project URL.
Anon key exposed to browser; keep RLS enabled.
Override passkey origin when the canonical host differs from localhost.
Injected during build to surface git SHA/version in the UI.
Playwright-only flag to relax offline queue safeguards.
Server-side Supabase access; identical secret must exist in the web runtime and Supabase functions.
Optional Supabase JWT secret for server-side token validation.
Supabase REST endpoint for edge functions; mirrors NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL.
Global pepper for OTP hashing and rate limit signatures.
Optional override for rate limiting HMAC; falls back to BACKUP_PEPPER when unset.
Optional email OTP pepper; defaults to BACKUP_PEPPER.
Signs short-lived MFA session cookies.
Signs trusted-device cookies.
Lifetime (seconds) for MFA session cookie; must be positive integer.
Lifetime (seconds) for trusted-device cookie; must be positive integer.
Override WebAuthn relying party ID when auto-detection fails.
Force WebAuthn origin; defaults to SITE_URL or NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL.
Display name for WebAuthn relying party.
Default locale for MFA email copy.
Sender email used for OTP mailers; must align with verified domain.
Timestamped HMAC for webhook authentication; identical across runtimes.
OpenAI Responses API key for OCR and SMS parsing.
Model name for OCR endpoint; must be available in configured OpenAI account.
Structured JSON model used for SMS parsing + analytics.
Primary 32-byte base64 key for encrypting MFA secrets; one of KMS_DATA_KEY/KMS_DATA_KEY_BASE64 must be set.
Legacy alias for MFA/data encryption key; ensure value decodes to 32 bytes.
Fallback alias for the KMS data key when using older Supabase deployments.
Bearer token required to trigger cache revalidation; omit to disable endpoint.
Optional HMAC secret for signed CSV exports.
Default sender when SMTP is configured instead of Supabase Resend function.
Optional SMTP host for fallback email delivery.
SMTP port when using legacy email pipeline.
Optional SMTP auth user.
Optional SMTP auth password.
HTTP endpoint for structured log forwarding.
Auth token included when forwarding logs.
Source identifier for log drain payloads.
Timeout (ms) for log drain HTTP requests.
Webhook invoked on repeated drain failures.
Auth token for alert webhook.
Minimum delay (ms) between alert webhook triggers.
Set to 1 to silence console warnings when the drain is unreachable (local dev only).
WhatsApp/SMS automation integration; optional.
Twilio auth token for authx notifications.
Default Twilio sender for WhatsApp outbound messages.
Explicit site origin when the canonical domain differs from localhost.
Base URL for Supabase edge functions used in smoke tests.
Set to 1 to skip PWA service worker bundling.
Enables bundle analyzer plugin for diagnostics.
Deployment descriptor (local/staging/production) forwarded to logs and health checks.
Optional git SHA injected during builds for diagnostics.
Human-readable region identifier reported in health endpoints.
Port bound by `pnpm start`; defaults to 3000 when unset.
Allows privileged automation (bootstrap admin flows).
CORS allowlist for export/reconciliation functions.
Historical window (days) for forecasting job.
Forecast horizon (days) for analytics job.
Rate limit rolling window (seconds) for Supabase functions.
Maximum requests allowed per window for Supabase functions.
Auto-escalation threshold (hours) for reconciliation job.
Delay (minutes) before GSM automation is considered stale.
Maximum batch size for GSM automation polling.
Resend API key used by MFA email function.
Override base URL for Playwright tests.
Local Supabase URL for e2e tests.
Anon key used during Playwright runs.
Stub service-role key to satisfy env validation in e2e harness.
Stub OpenAI key for local Playwright server process.
Stub HMAC secret for Playwright boot server.
Enables fake auth flows during e2e tests; bypasses Supabase.
Stub pepper injected for Playwright server startup.
Stub secret used for Playwright MFA cookie tests.
Stub trusted-device secret for Playwright harness.
Stub rate-limit HMAC secret for Playwright harness.
Stub 32-byte base64 key for local MFA crypto tests.
Used to adjust Playwright retries + server reuse inside CI.
Runtime mode (development/test/production); influences caching + PWA flags.
